Others: Knee problems had sidelined Ball for several seasons, but after returning in the preseason, he is now poised to be a key contributor off the bench for the Bulls.
The Pelicans defeated the Bulls, 123-111, with Brandon Ingram leading the way with 33 points and C.J. McCollum adding 23.
Lonzo Ball played 13 minutes and 39 seconds, tallying five points and four assists.
LaVar Ball, father of NBA players LaMelo and Lonzo Ball, criticized the NBA's conditioning programs, blaming them for his sons' frequent injuries.
